description: seated figure wearing long drapery, including drapery in a hood over head; figure had PR knee raised and rests PL elbow on a rock, with head on PL hand, looking up; rocky ground
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash and white and black chalk on blue laid paper washed with green
provenance: [Rosella Gilli, Milan, until 1986; sold, April 1, 1986, for Â£800, to Armando Veerman, for Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1986-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Drapery Study: Seated Figure
